ch0122_90_yo/0101_0701_01_10:
Alola, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! I’ve been
waiting for you!
ch0122_90_yo/0101_0701_02_10:
Let’s go to all sorts of places today so we
can meet more people and Pokémon!
ch0122_90_yo/7101_0701_01_10:
I want everyone on Pasio—in the entire
world—to know that Alolan Pokémon and
Trainers are the best!
ch0122_90_yo/7101_0701_02_10:
Professor Kukui created the Pokémon League
in Alola because he felt strongly that we
should have one...
ch0122_90_yo/7101_0701_03_10: I kind of understand how he felt now.
ch0122_90_yo/7102_0701_01_10:
Lately, Professor Kukui’s been interested in
Necrozma’s moves...
ch0122_90_yo/7102_0701_02_10:
But I’m not sure the professor’s body could
withstand Necrozma’s full power, huh?
ch0122_90_yo/7103_0701_01_10:
I’m a Neo Champion now, which means I
have to act proper and set an example for
everyone.
ch0122_90_yo/7103_0701_02_10:
Maybe I should ask Hala and the other
kahunas to teach me about the manners
they follow...
ch0122_90_yo/7104_0701_01_10:
My Neo Champion outfit is easy to move
around in. I really like the breezy design!
ch0122_90_yo/7104_0701_02_10:
I have to do my best to be just as cool as
my outfit!
ch0122_90_yo/7105_0701_02_10:
When you think about it, fusion and finishing
moves are pretty cool and exciting!
ch0122_90_yo/1701_0701_01_10: Alola! I have a present for you!
ch0122_90_yo/1701_0702_01_10: Don’t hold back! Go full power with it!
ch0122_90_yo/2501_0701_01_10:
My Necrozma’s a different color than other
ones.
ch0122_90_yo/2501_0701_02_10:
It’s rare, too...like an annular total solar
eclipse!
ch0122_90_yo/2501_0701_03_10:
Molayne taught me all about those!
Apparently, they’re a rarer type of
total eclipse!
ch0122_90_yo/2501_0702_01_10:
Even though it’s a rare Pokémon, it’s extra
special, even among those...
ch0122_90_yo/2501_0702_02_10:
I guess that must mean me and Necrozma
meeting was destiny, huh?
ch0122_90_yo/2511_0701_01_10:
I may be a Neo Champion now, but that
isn’t gonna to change what I do.
ch0122_90_yo/2511_0701_02_10:
I’m gonna enjoy every day at full power so
I can get even stronger!
ch0122_90_yo/2511_0701_03_10:
No matter how far I go, I have to
remember what it was like when I
was starting out!
ch0122_90_yo/2511_0702_01_10:
One thing that changed for me since
becoming a Neo Champion...
ch0122_90_yo/2511_0702_02_10:
is that I’m getting challenged to battles a lot
more now!
ch0122_90_yo/2511_0702_03_10:
I still try to think of myself as a challenger,
though!
ch0122_90_yo/3001_0701_01_10:
Alola! If you’re still sleepy, soaking up some
sun should help!
ch0122_90_yo/3003_0701_01_10:
The sun isn’t done! We can still have fun
until it sets!
ch0122_90_yo/3005_0701_01_10:
I had fun today. Let’s make sure tomorrow’s
just as awesome!
